channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: Pen and Paper Exercises in Machine Learning
item.description: This is a collection of (mostly) pen-and-paper exercises in machine learning.

item.title: LViT: Language meets Vision Transformer in Medical Image Segmentation
item.description: In our model, medical text annotation is introduced to compensate for the quality deficiency in image data.

item.title: Multi-Graph Fusion Networks for Urban Region Embedding
item.description: Human mobility data contains rich but abundant information, which yields to the comprehensive region embeddings for cross domain tasks.

item.title: Forecasting Future World Events with Neural Networks
item.description: We test language models on our forecasting task and find that performance is far below a human expert baseline.

item.title: Denoised MDPs: Learning World Models Better Than the World Itself
item.description: The ability to separate signal from noise, and reason with clean abstractions, is critical to intelligence.

item.title: Ivy: Templated Deep Learning for Inter-Framework Portability
item.description: We introduce Ivy, a templated Deep Learning (DL) framework which abstracts existing DL frameworks.

item.title: BoT-SORT: Robust Associations Multi-Pedestrian Tracking
item.description: The goal of multi-object tracking (MOT) is detecting and tracking all the objects in a scene, while keeping a unique identifier for each object.

item.title: ProGen2: Exploring the Boundaries of Protein Language Models
item.description: Attention-based models trained on protein sequences have demonstrated incredible success at classification and generation tasks relevant for artificial intelligence-driven protein design.

item.title: BLIP: Bootstrapping Language-Image Pre-training for Unified Vision-Language Understanding and Generation
item.description: Furthermore, performance improvement has been largely achieved by scaling up the dataset with noisy image-text pairs collected from the web, which is a suboptimal source of supervision.

item.title: TSM: Temporal Shift Module for Efficient Video Understanding
item.description: The explosive growth in video streaming gives rise to challenges on performing video understanding at high accuracy and low computation cost.

item.title: HiVT: Hierarchical Vector Transformer for Multi-Agent Motion Prediction
item.description: To tackle this challenge, we propose Hierarchical Vector Transformer (HiVT) for fast and accurate multi-agent motion prediction.

item.title: Accelerating Sparse DNN Models without Hardware-Support via Tile-Wise Sparsity
item.description: Network pruning can reduce the high computation cost of deep neural network (DNN) models.

item.title: SQuant: On-the-Fly Data-Free Quantization via Diagonal Hessian Approximation
item.description: This paper proposes an on-the-fly DFQ framework with sub-second quantization time, called SQuant, which can quantize networks on inference-only devices with low computation and memory requirements.

item.title: EdgeNeXt: Efficiently Amalgamated CNN-Transformer Architecture for Mobile Vision Applications
item.description: Our EdgeNeXt model with 1. 3M parameters achieves 71. 2\% top-1 accuracy on ImageNet-1K, outperforming MobileViT with an absolute gain of 2. 2\% with 28\% reduction in FLOPs.

item.title: PolarFormer: Multi-camera 3D Object Detection with Polar Transformers
item.description: 3D object detection in autonomous driving aims to reason "what" and "where" the objects of interest present in a 3D world.

item.title: Zero-Shot Text-to-Image Generation
item.description: Text-to-image generation has traditionally focused on finding better modeling assumptions for training on a fixed dataset.

item.title: EPro-PnP: Generalized End-to-End Probabilistic Perspective-n-Points for Monocular Object Pose Estimation
item.description: The 2D-3D coordinates and corresponding weights are treated as intermediate variables learned by minimizing the KL divergence between the predicted and target pose distribution.

item.title: A Sentinel-2 multi-year, multi-country benchmark dataset for crop classification and segmentation with deep learning
item.description: In this work we introduce Sen4AgriNet, a Sentinel-2 based time series multi country benchmark dataset, tailored for agricultural monitoring applications with Machine and Deep Learning.

item.title: MineDojo: Building Open-Ended Embodied Agents with Internet-Scale Knowledge
item.description: Autonomous agents have made great strides in specialist domains like Atari games and Go.

item.title: FlashAttention: Fast and Memory-Efficient Exact Attention with IO-Awareness
item.description: We also extend FlashAttention to block-sparse attention, yielding an approximate attention algorithm that is faster than any existing approximate attention method.
